document.title: Pellete de liens du 15-07-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
Stricto Sensu : Getjetablemail ( via ) Cette extension permet dutiliser le service de Jetable de maniere transparente depuis Mozilla ou Firefox. (Tags: firefox mail extension )
Themes Azerty III pour Firefox par Graphys ! ( via )
(Tags: firefox skin )
xml:id Version 1.0 ( via ) This document defines the meaning of the attribute xml:id as an ID attribute in XML documents and defines processing of this attribute to identify IDs in the absence of validation. (Tags: w3c xml dtd )
Origamatrix ( via ) ^^ (Tags: animation haha )
Raiden X ( via ) Un shoot'em up en flash tres reussi. (Tags: flash jeu )
june2004hastings-mammatus ( via ) Nuages tres etranges... mais photos magnifiques ! (Tags: photo )
Good Experience Games - good games, fun games ( via ) These are online games that, in my opinion, offer a "good experience" - good game design with an overall attention to quality. Unless otherwise noted, they're all free, online, and available right now. (Tags: flash jeu )
SimpleKDE | SimpleKDE; a lightweight, clean and user-friendly desktop environment based on KDE A lightweight, clean and user-friendly desktop environment based on KDE. (Tags: libre linux kde wm )
Sidenet Wine Configuration Utility ( via ) Internet Explorer sous linux, c'est possible (Tags: ie linux windows )
De la liberte, la face meconnue de l'informatique - Where is Ploum ? Ou l'on apprend que la liberte n'est peut-etre qu'une simple question d'habitude (Tags: libre )
